subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Right wing Todd Bertuzzi, 32, signed a two-year contract with the Stanley Cup champion Anaheim Ducks yesterday. Financial terms were not disclosed. Bertuzzi played in only 15 games with the Florida Panthers and Detroit Red Wings last season because of a back injury.
